txt.en: 'Athelward, and his belated wife Emma, have raised four daughters, Gytha, Ides, Mildred, and Áffa. Gytha dwells with Erkenwulf, son of Erkenbrand, at Helm's Deep. Ides seeks to become as fearsome a combatant as her father, and has begun training as a shield-maiden. The youngest girls, Mildred and Áffa, reside at the mead-hall with their father.\n\n'Poor Emma passed away some years ago, before Athelward was able to sire a son. Her death sent Athelward into a long period of despair, but his mood has improved of late. He has begun eagerly searching for a new wife, with which to produce a male heir.'
